## Field.isSerializable() method

Check whether this field should be serialized by the XML renderer. Handles the logic for backwards compatibility and incongruous states.  Whether this field should be serialized or not.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isSerializable(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
